About this whole debate, guys, its exactly the type of thing that can 
go on the message board at the site and not clog up RPG mail! The 
site's at http://nbwrpg.tripod.com in case anyone doesn't know.

::DevilDuer::

Breathing heavilly, DevilDuer runs up to Scorpina's pod, stopping 
near it. It looked like it was already scanning.

The Alliance bot sits down, covering his eyes from the sand as he 
waits for the pod to finish scanning.

----------
